item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Has your azz gotten really big ?????  then slim it down by some swimming excersizes.

No Ice on this Cement Pond !!

Swimming is a good excersize for anyone, for us its important to keep physically and mentally fit for our water related summer activities also.

 (Bad Driving Conditions or really Bad weather cancells this event, i will update as necessary prior to the event if necessary)

Weather update: http://forecast.weather.gov/MapClick.php?CityName=Wethersfield&state=CT&site=BOX&textField1=41.7011&textField2=-72.6701&e=0

I can't do any sun exposure just yet but chlorine is now a bit more tolerable so instead of a hike (Central Ct Hiking does a nice easy one on Saturday morning which on occasion i do), this will give you a different kind of workout to keep you fit ( i only plan to list this event a few times this year at most).

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

You can stay home and get fat & lazy or get in shape and be ready for the Summer of splashing in the water with your paddle or Look Good for HOT DATE..etc... !

Do you Feel and look like the picture below ?????????????

-

-

-

-

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Well maybe this event will light a little fire under your AZZ and get you to get in shape...

MEET AT : BACKMAN POOL AT WETHERSFIELD HIGH SCHOOL @ 1 pm in the parking lot.

Look for me in the Orange Hunting Hat..

411 Wolcott Hill Road. Enter drive way and go past the front part of the building (sort of left in the parking lot) and head to the last building addition parking lot where i hope you can see the Orange Stryped cones on my car roof.

Open 10/11-5/19. Saturday 1:00-3:45P Recreational Swim ---

Nonresidents and guests must be accompanied by a resident adult  (I TAKE CARE OF THAT PART IF WE GO IN TOGETHER). 

Groups of 10+ must notify Parks & Recreation prior to their event.Daily Admission:

Adult $3, Child (under 18) $1,

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

The Pool Parking Lot is near the running track (South West End of School Building).

 

See those that want to get in shape.

 

Pot Luck Event is afterward at my home.. keep it healthy though.. :-)

 

al-r
item.how_to_find_us: Look for ORANGE STRIPED TRAFFIC CONES @ parking lot and me wearing an ORANGE Hunting HAT

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: JAN 28 **Swimming Excersize at Indoor Heated Pool** --> Wethersfield High Skool
